archimate:Requirement.name: IM.1.2.5c: c) the handling requirements for each level of classification at each stage of the information lifecycle (e.g. when creating, processing (including copying and printing), transmitting, storing and destroying information)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
